Blog.post: hello all i started to work today and got to work with cheryl, i finally found out how to spell her name. anyway cheryl is hot and i saw her in a bikini wow is she hot. nothing compared to erin though. well thats all for now so bye.

so today is now the third day that ive had this journal well anyway it is around 5:05 and im sittin here at erins house typing... in this BLOG of mine. why did i even create a blog i dont know why i guess i was just bored well so hmmmmm erins coming back today maurice is going to go leave this place at eight and probably be back by like nine thirty. well bill finaly got a job at npc and i start working the day after tomorow and my birthday is in like 3 days. cant wait to start working with the hot girl, u know sheryl yeah shes pretty hot well thats all for now signing off at 5:09 so bye

so here i am again still at nates kinda bored like always. yeah so umm ryan just came over a little while ago and those two r in the other room messing around with the guitar and drums and im in here listening to their annoyance. so whats up in the world outside my blog huh huh tell me . i dont even know what im typing anymore man i have no life. well this is fun just rabbling on about random stuff not making to much sense. so im going to go to the movies tonite and see dodgeball that should be fun. hmmm what to type hmmmmmmmmm well its 2:15 rite now and its still june 25 yup well this is fun just randomly typing stuff. why wont they stop, theyre still making bad sounds come out of that flippin room well im gonna go now and change my journal a bit ok well bye.

so it is june 25 now and my second day with a blog and it appears that i am at nates house rite now updating because i am to poor to afford a new computer and the internet. man cant wait my birthday is in 4 days now and i start working with that hot girl well thats all for now

so its june 24 and today is the first time ive ever gotten a blog. so today i went to jims house and bill nate and jerimiah went as well. after jims house nate and jeremiah left then the rest of us went to ross music. man im kinda pissed off at tim because he wants to get a bass and amp which is fine but the bass is a bc rich beast which costs about $5-600. well anyways only four days til my birthday. well me and my friends r going to hooters in a little bit that should be fun. man im such a loser, i really need a girlfriend. to tell u the truth im a little desperate rite now for a girl. i was supposed to go out with laura tonite but i couldnt because her sister had to go and bust her face open. man i cant wait for monday when i start working for one reason, im working with this really hot girl named sheryl (i think thats how u spell it i dont know im just stupid)man is she hot. well its 7:05 rite now and im my cousins house kinda board thats y i decided to create this stupid blog. o yeah i dont know y im writing this but i thought maybe u would like to know that im listening to some reel big fish rite now (my favorite band at this point may i add) wow y do i have friends im kinda wierd in my own opinion.

so yeah im sittin here at erins bored out of fricken mind typing to u. well she is over at caths house with donna and cath watchin a movie and im stuck here bored cause no one else is around rite now. and yesterday erin maurice the rest of the clan nate and jeremiah and catherine all went to the beach house without me so i was home pissed off and bored once again. well i dunno life really sucks rite now i guess thats all for now ill keep u posted talk to you later whatever dont care bye.

hey everybody im here at erins like always cause i have no life. well im not pissed off any more about last nite im now a little freaked out tho. i guess on the way there or back to jeremys house i dont remember there was a pretty bad accident on the highway. and the thing that freaked me out about that was maurice had to take the van back cause she didnt trust it on the highway so she came back and grabbed the truck which i tried to hide in the bed of it so i could go for the ride. but think if maurice just took the van instaed of coming back the we could of been in that accident. or it could of happened in the truck while i was riding in the back of the bed. so i guess everything does happen for a reason. well signing off for now talk to u again soon bye.

hello fellow viewers im here sittin at erins house alone because i got kicked out of the truck because megan was crying and wouldnt let maurice take me in the bed of the truck. so im a little mad now. u know what it is always better to write in ur journal later in the nite. so i guess that'll be all for now so im gonna go and do somthin i dunno bye.

hello all im back again im just sittin here at erins like usual. so its monday and i dont know why i decided to type in this blog rite now but o well. so ryan came back from france today and yeah thats all i have to say for now so talk to you again some other time i dont know when so bye for now.

hello all my blog viewers hows it been. its been a while since ive posted anything. so ive been working for like two weeks now and its all rite u know kinda tiring being out in the sun by the pool all day. and u really learn how to hate kids after working with them for a week. yeah well anyways i think i might be goin to the beach tomorow with erin maurice kerry megan and the rest of the maurice clan. it should be fun o yeah by the way kerry is such a freak!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! well im thinkin thats all for now be back whenever bye.

hello all my blog viewers hows it been. its been a while since ive posted anything. so ive been working for like two weeks now and its all rite u know kinda tiring being out in the sun by the pool all day. and u really learn how to hate kids after working with them for a week. yeah well anyways i think i might be goin to the beach tomorow with erin maurice kerry megan and the rest of the maurice clan. it should be fun o yeah by the way kerry is such a freak!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! well im thinkin thats all for now be back whenever bye.
so yeah today is the wbru concert in providence. cant wait its gonna be so fun. well thats all for now bye.

so hello everybody im here at erins house like always. so yeah i went camping last week and had a lot of fun up in new hampshire. well it wasnt really camping we kinda stayed in cabins but it was still fun. i was so mad because yesterday i was supposed to go to the beach with my friends but for one reason or another most of them couldnt go. so i was supposed to go to the beach tomorow with laura but something "came up" and we cant go now. yeah so it kinda sux and i was mad for a little bit but o well shit happens i guess well got to do some stuff be back later bye.

i hate kids so fricken much today especially when they hit you without a fuckin reason. yeah like today i was at work down back while the kids played some dodgeball and when i had them line up this one girl took a wiffle ball bat and pretended to hit me at first then for no apparent reason she hit me across the chest with the bat. so yeah that really put me in a shitty mood after work. well thats all for now talk to you later. bye
